rules.name: Suspicious Process Execution - Rule 1
rules.oci_query: * | where 'Process Name' like '%cmd.exe%' and 'Command Line' like '%powershell%' | head 100
rules.author: Security Team

rules.name: Network Connection to Suspicious Domain - Rule 2
rules.description: Detects network connections to known malicious domains
rules.oci_query: * | where 'Event Name' = 'Network Connection' and 'Domain' like '%.tk%' | head 100
rules.author: Security Team

rules.name: Failed Authentication Attempts - Rule 3
rules.oci_query: * | where 'Event Name' = 'Logon Failed' and 'Event ID' = 4625 | head 100
rules.author: Security Team

rules.name: Registry Modification - Rule 4
rules.oci_query: * | where 'Event Name' = 'Registry Value Set' and 'Registry Path' like '%Run%' | head 100
rules.author: Security Team

rules.name: DNS Query to Suspicious Domain - Rule 5
rules.description: Detects DNS queries to potentially malicious domains
rules.oci_query: * | where 'Event Name' = 'DNS Query' and 'DNS Query' like '%.bit%' | head 100
rules.author: Security Team

rules.description: Detects network connections to known malicious domains
rules.oci_query: * | where 'Event Name' = 'Network Connection' and 'Domain' like '%.tk%' | head 100
rules.author: Security Team

rules.name: Failed Authentication Attempts - Rule 133
rules.oci_query: * | where 'Event Name' = 'Logon Failed' and 'Event ID' = 4625 | head 100
rules.author: Security Team

rules.name: Registry Modification - Rule 134
rules.oci_query: * | where 'Event Name' = 'Registry Value Set' and 'Registry Path' like '%Run%' | head 100
rules.author: Security Team

rules.name: DNS Query to Suspicious Domain - Rule 135
rules.description: Detects DNS queries to potentially malicious domains

rules.author: Security Team

rules.oci_query: * | where 'Process Name' like '%cmd.exe%' and 'Command Line' like '%powershell%' | head 100
